name: oil boiler production, 100kW | oil boiler, 100kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7492/documentation

Inventory for an oil boiler with a life time of 20 years.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Infrastructure of the boiler, including electric equipment. Energy use for the production. Disposal of the facilities.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Materials investigated in 1993. Energy use estimated based on environmental report from 1998.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for Swiss and German producers.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Oil boiler used in multiple family dwelling.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data for Germany used with assumptions for Swiss energy supply.
